import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from "axios"; function AddQuiz() { const [itemlist, setItemlist] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`/api/all-item-quiz`).then(res => { if (res.data.status === 200) { setItemlist(res.data.item); } }); }, []) return (

Add Quiz View Quiz

) } export default AddQuiz;
